name: NULL
description:
CAUTION: Some areas in this game cause a significant flickering effect.
NULL is a surreal adventure game. What you see in the end depends on what you can find on the way.
A 100% playthrough can be completed in 10-15 minutes, if you know where everything is.
NOTE: This is a companion game to Messages, my odd game about texting!
Controls:
Arrows: MoveZ/X/C: Interact (when prompted)
Tips:
There are two types of things to find. Each area has exactly one of each.Some hidden things will only appear once you've reached the end of an area.If you get totally stuck, maybe try resting for a minute.
You can also play NULL on the PICO-8 website: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=30504
